title: Trump to Curb Use of Federal Guidance in Issuing Regulations
text:
WASHINGTON—President Trump is planning to sign a pair of executive orders on Wednesday meant to limit the use of a tool that the administration argues circumvents the federal rule-making process, according to administration officials.

The orders have to do with federal guidance, which an administration can issue to explain how it might interpret or implement a federal policy. Conservatives have long said this process lets the government make major policy decisions without giving the public an opportunity to offer input. Unlike...
description: President Trump is planning to sign a pair of executive orders meant to limit the use of a tool that the administration argues circumvents the federal rule-making process, according to administration officials.
